definition: Han ethnic group/Chinese (language)/the Han dynasty (206 BC-220 AD)

sentences.english: We also had dinner in Xiangbin's private Diaojiao house. Wine was the Yao men's favorite drink all along.
sentences.chinese: 晚餐在吊脚楼里举行，酒是瑶家汉子的最爱。

sentences.english: A man came and slammed the turtle out fall.
sentences.chinese: 一个汉子走过来，用力把海龟翻个四脚朝天。

sentences.english: I had never seen a grown man break down and cry.
sentences.chinese: 我从未曾看到过一个这么强壮的汉子痛哭失声。

sentences.english: This has eight men in moncler coats field, by moncler coats moment two die two injury.
sentences.chinese: 场中本有八名汉子，此刻两死两伤。

sentences.english: He is tough，but I am even tougher.
sentences.chinese: 他是一个硬汉子，不过我要比他更硬。

sentences.english: B woman who can't forgive should never have more than a nodding acquaintance with a man.

sentences.english: LeiYuan is a man of true temperament, vowed to Quebec accounted for when blood.

sentences.english: He was a truly transcultural person, and a man who had realized his humanity.
sentences.chinese: 他是真正跨文化的人物，一个认识做人之仁的汉子。

sentences.english: One time a Chinese man went into a Western-style restaurant and ordered some dishes.
sentences.chinese: 一次，一位中国汉子进了一家西餐厅，点了几味菜。

sentences.english: What could this man, who was reproved, say to that woman, who was dead?
sentences.chinese: 这个待死的汉子，对这已死的妇人有什么可说的呢？

sentences.english: Hemingway portrays many "the dauntless man" image.
sentences.chinese: 海明威塑造出许多“硬汉子”的形象。

sentences.english: And the just man trailed God's messenger.
sentences.chinese: 但见这正直的汉子一路尾随上帝的信使。

sentences.english: Your father is the example. How strong he was! But he couldn't endure such hard work.
sentences.chinese: 你爸就是个例子，多么强壮的汉子，照样被累倒了。

sentences.english: Just in maximize of her- a minge drops severing papers.
sentences.chinese: 就在她的后面，有位汉子掉了几张报纸。

sentences.english: I hingzheimeris disease never seen a grown man fail and cry.
sentences.chinese: 我从不曾看到过一个这么健旺的汉子痛哭失声。

sentences.english: Those are certainly possessed of dauntless courage.
sentences.chinese: 那些都是天不怕地不怕的硬汉子。
